keywords: spacious, breakthrough, investment, prime, safe & secure neighborhood, wide roads, public transportation
description: A spacious 111 square yards land is available at a breakthrough sale price of AED 90,00,006 as a great investment opportunity in a prime location of the city. The land is located at Al Mwaihat near suitably wide roads and in one of fastest growing locations of Ajman. It lies in a safe & secure neighborhood while being close to public transportation as well. The locality has excellent future growth prospects. The land has the number 40 within a gated layout and faces towards the east. This property has amenities like 24-hour security and badminton court.

A 242 square yards land is available at a compelling sale price of AED 72,500 in a prime location of Downtown Dubai. This represents a wonderful investment opportunity for the future, particularly in terms of appreciation potential. The land is located at Downtown Dubai, one of Dubai's most popular localities, this locality is close to public transportation. This is an south facing land that is numbered 253. It includes amenities such as large green area, restaurants and pre-school.
